Control Name: 4.3.1 Built a capacity model for the application
Control Statement: Is there a capacity model for the application identifying relationships between the utilization of various components, to capture when and how to scale-out?

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.3 How have you ensured required capacity and services are available in targeted regions?
